verses.translation: Umuntu azavuga ati “Ese noneho (isi) yabaye iki?”
Kubera ko Nyagasani wawe azaba yayibitegetse.

verses.arabic_text: يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَصۡدُرُ ٱلنَّاسُ أَشۡتَاتٗا لِّيُرَوۡاْ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ
verses.translation: Kuri uwo munsi, abantu bazasohoka (mu mva) batatanye kugira ngo berekwe ibikorwa byabo.

verses.arabic_text: فَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيۡرٗا يَرَهُۥ
verses.translation: Icyo gihe uzaba yarakoze icyiza gifite uburemere bungana n’akantu gato cyane kurusha ibindi, azakibona (agihemberwe).

verses.arabic_text: وَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٖ شَرّٗا يَرَهُۥ
verses.translation: N’uzaba yarakoze ikibi gifite uburemere bungana n’akantu gato cyane kurusha ibindi, azakibona (agihanirwe).
